fields.summary: Read-only properties cannot be overridden by the user when creating a COMPANY

content.text: Read-only properties are for example `ID`, `created_at` and `updated_at`. Analog to unknown properties, those fields will be ignored. They will not be processed and there will be no info, warning or error that they were skipped.

fields.summary: Create COMPANY Node

issuetype.description: Eine Funktionalität oder Funktion, ausgedrückt als Benutzerziel.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.summary: Unknown properties are ignored when creating a COMPANY

content.text: The user can provide properties that are not specified in the epic MCA-201, but they will be completely ignored. They will not be processed and there will be no info, warning or error that they were skipped.

fields.summary: Create COMPANY Node

issuetype.description: Eine Funktionalität oder Funktion, ausgedrückt als Benutzerziel.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.summary: The response contains all specified properties when creating a COMPANY

content.text: All properties are returned that are specified in the epic MCA-201. When properties are empty they are returned with null values. IDs, timestamp and other meta information might be included too, but is not in the scope of this AC.

issuetype.description: Eine Funktionalität oder Funktion, ausgedrückt als Benutzerziel.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.summary: Requests to create a COMPANY are rejected when the provided data is invalid

content.text: Data is invalid when its structure is incorrect, has syntax errors or does not contain all mandatory fields.

issuetype.description: Eine Funktionalität oder Funktion, ausgedrückt als Benutzerziel.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.summary: Requests to create a COMPANY are accepted when the provided data is valid

content.text: Data is valid when its structure is correct, has no syntax errors and contains all mandatory fields.
